import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create view user share"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/users/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a user share assignment for a view so a specific user can access it.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views), [GET /api/v1.0/assets/views](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-views), [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views), or [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views).
2. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find the recipient and extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Choose a view to share and copy its ViewId.
2. Find the recipient userId via search.
3. [POST /api/v1.0/views/users/new](/docs/api/views/create-view-user) with ViewId, UserId, and Access.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `ViewId`, `UserId`, `Access`.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Share assignment for a view, either to an individual user or a team.","properties":{"ViewUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the user share assignment.","example":"c5e177b6-9968-4f65-95cc-842ae2d63b57"},"ViewTeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the team share assignment.","example":"2a0c8d3f-7d73-4bc2-9a6a-6d8dbd6b9ef4"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the share record was created.","example":"2025-08-20T08:29:55.807Z"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the share record was last updated.","example":"2025-08-20T08:29:55.807Z"},"ViewId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the shared view.","example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"},"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User receiving the share.","example":"c9a09d97-e757-4f9a-8918-f4eb4d4a0d9f"},"TeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Team receiving the share.","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},"Response":{"type":"string","description":"Invitation response captured from the user.","enum":["NoResponse","Accepted","Declined"],"example":"NoResponse"},"Access":{"type":"string","description":"Access level granted to the recipient.","enum":["View","Edit","Owner"],"example":"View"}},"example":{"ViewUserId":"c5e177b6-9968-4f65-95cc-842ae2d63b57","ViewTeamId":"2a0c8d3f-7d73-4bc2-9a6a-6d8dbd6b9ef4","CreatedDate":"2025-08-20T08:29:55.807Z","ModifiedDate":"2025-08-20T08:29:55.807Z","ViewId":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2","UserId":"c9a09d97-e757-4f9a-8918-f4eb4d4a0d9f","TeamId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","Response":"NoResponse","Access":"View"},"title":"ViewShare"},"example":{}}}}}
